en: She lost what little money she had.
zh: 她把身上仅有的那点儿钱全弄丢了。

en: She gave what few coins she had to the beggar.
zh: 她把仅有的几个硬币都给了乞丐。

en: She spoke with a suggestion of sarcasm in her voice.
zh: 她说话语气里带点儿讽刺。

en: She said that she was a little tired.
She ought to take a little rest.
She is being rather difficult.
She's by no means lacking in consideration. She's just shy.
zh: 她并不是没礼貌，只是有点儿害羞。

en: She is not in the least surprised.
She has nothing snobbish about her.
zh: 她这人一点儿都不势利。

en: She wasn't a bit impatient.
She stayed there for a short while.
She has little knowledge of science.
She had a little money.
She might look more attractive with a little make-up.
zh: 她化点儿妆可能会更好看。

en: She couldn't help but be a little vague.
zh: 她忍不住说得有点儿含糊。

en: She behaved as if she were a little girl to his sons.
zh: 她在他的儿子们面前表现得像个小女孩。

en: She bought flour and oil in quantity.
zh: 她买了大量的面粉和油。

en: She watched the bird carefully.
zh: 她仔细地观察着那只鸟。

en: She strode over the brook.
She will often sit there feeding birds.
She writes essays in addition to novels and poetry.
zh: 除了写小说和诗歌，她还写散文。

en: She sent me the enclosed check.
zh: 她给我寄来了随信附上的支票。

en: She hummed her child to sleep.
zh: 她哼着小曲儿哄孩子睡觉。

en: She had only a small sum of money.
She was living alone in a hut.
zh: 她独自住在一间小屋里。

en: She has a small black dog.
She gave a small cry of alarm and fled to the bathroom.
zh: 她惊叫了一声，跑进了浴室。

en: She spoke in a small voice.
She is like a hen with one chicken.
zh: 她就像护犊子的老母鸡一样。

en: She will be famous in the future.
She will be a famous artist in the future.
zh: 她将来会成为著名的艺术家。

en: She was able to go to college thanks to the scholarship.
zh: 靠着奖学金，她才上了大学。

en: She is diligent and smart enough to win a scholarship.
zh: 她又聪明又勤奋，足以拿到奖学金。

en: She guided her business to success.
She is employed in a trading company.
zh: 她在一家贸易公司工作。

en: She applied a bandage to the wound.
She is getting better by degrees.
zh: 她的身体正在慢慢好转。

en: She slowly developed hatred toward me.
She is getting better by slow degrees.
zh: 她的情况正在一点一点好转。

en: She was dressed after the fashion of an actress.
She aimed to become an actress.
zh: 她的目标是当一名女演员。

en: She intended to become an actress.
She aspired to become an actress.
zh: 她渴望成为一名女演员。

en: She is famous as an actress.
zh: 她作为一名女演员很有名。

en: She became an actress.
She is not so much an actress as a singer.
zh: 与其说她是演员，不如说她是歌手。

en: Besides being an actress, she was a famous painter.
zh: 除了是演员，她还是位著名的画家。

en: She was an actress and was treated as such.
zh: 她是个演员，也受到了演员般的待遇。

en: She advocated equal rights for women.
She is a strenuous supporter of women's rights.
zh: 她是女权的坚定支持者。

en: She goes to a girls' high school.
She passed the entrance examination to the girl's high school.
She is brave for a girl.
zh: 作为一个女孩子，她挺勇敢的。

en: She's a girl, but she's brave.
zh: 她虽然是个女孩，但胆子很大。

en: She is a lady, and ought to be treated as such.
zh: 她是个淑女，理应受到那样的对待。

en: Woman as she was, she fought bravely.
zh: 虽然是个女生，但她打得很勇敢。

en: She is in need of help.
She screamed for help.
She shouted for help, but no one came.
zh: 她大喊救命，但没人过来。

en: She requested help, but no one came.
zh: 她请求帮助，但没人理她。

en: She confined herself to her study and wept to her heart's content.
zh: 她把自己关在书房里哭了个痛快。

en: She's writing something in her study.
She had a book stolen from the library.
zh: 她在图书馆丢了一本书。

en: She cannot write or read.
She can't write or read.
She signed over the money to her daughter.
zh: 她把那笔钱转到了她女儿名下。

en: She is attached to the general affairs section.
She is sensitive to the heat.
She acted in a play for the first time.
She went to Paris for the first time.
She was quite nervous about her first flight.
zh: 她第一次坐飞机，特别紧张。

en: She was discouraged from publishing her first novel.
zh: 有人劝她不要发表她的第一部小说。

en: She has a bias toward Japanese literature.
She has an abundant supply of seeds to plant in the spring.
zh: 她有很多春天要种的种子。

en: She studied English as hard as she could.
She studied French as hard as possible.
zh: 她尽可能努力地学习法语。

en: She is trying to save as much money as she can.
She has been with a publishing company for two years.
zh: 她在一家出版社工作两年了。

en: She will carry out her plan, regardless of expense.
zh: 不管花多少钱，她都会执行她的计划。

en: She is about to leave.
When she appeared in court, she was wearing a sort of crown.
zh: 她出庭的时候戴着个类似皇冠的东西。

en: She denied having been asked to go on a business trip.
zh: 她否认有人找她去出差。

en: She gave a look as much as to say, "Get out".
zh: 她的眼神像是在说“滚出去”。

en: She was on the point of leaving.
She stayed at home all day instead of going out.
zh: 她整天待在家里，没出门。

en: She must have gone out.
She is a lady among ladies.
She is a lady and expects to be treated as such.
zh: 她是个淑女，也希望别人能那样对待她。

en: She ought to have finished her homework.
She was busy doing her homework.
She has done her homework.
She finished her homework in an hour.
zh: 她一小时就把作业写完了。

en: She was named Alice after her aunt.
zh: 她随她阿姨的名字叫爱丽丝。

en: She went to Paris for the purpose of seeing her aunt.
zh: 她去巴黎就是为了看她阿姨。

en: She went to Paris to see her aunt.
She came to live with her aunt.
zh: 她搬去和她阿姨一起住了。

en: She shot a gun.
It is said that she is seriously ill.
She's guilty of a grave blunder.
She made a serious mistake.
She showed her regret over the serious mistake.
zh: 她对那个严重的错误感到很后悔。

en: She became very ill.
She's suffering from a serious disease.
zh: 她得了一种很严重的病。

en: She had her heavy suitcase carried by the porter.
zh: 她让搬运工帮她拎那个沉重的行李箱。

en: She is flexible in her opinions.
She spoke in soft tones.
She was kind enough.
She is well able to read.
She has grieved over his loss for nearly ten years.
zh: 她为他的去世悲痛了将近十年。

en: She got married in her teens.
zh: 她十几岁的时候就结婚了。

en: She turned off all the lights at ten.
She has ten children.
She was wearing an ugly dress.
zh: 她穿了一件很难看的裙子。

en: She earns on average ten pounds a week.
She takes cooking lessons once a week.
She plays tennis with her friends once a week.
zh: 她每周和朋友打一次网球。

en: She writes to her parents once a week.
zh: 她每周给父母写一次信。

en: She goes to the bookstore once a week.
She goes to the hospital once a week.
She went to the market once a week.
zh: 她以前每周去一趟菜市场。

en: She goes to aerobics once a week.
zh: 她每周去做一次有氧运动。

en: She continued studying all her life.
zh: 她一辈子都在坚持学习。

en: She lived all her life in that town.
zh: 她在那座小镇住了一辈子。

en: The moment she'd finished, she lay down for a nap.
zh: 她一忙完，就躺下睡了个午觉。

en: She passed away peacefully in her sleep.
zh: 她在睡梦中安详地去世了。

en: She was interviewed for jobs.
She can't make up her mind whether to get a job or to go on to college.
zh: 她还没想好是去工作还是去读大学。

en: She looked around, but she couldn't see anything.
zh: 她向四周看，但什么也没看到。

en: She tried to make both ends meet.
She spends a major part of her income on food.
zh: 她收入的大部分都花在吃上了。

en: She absented herself from class.
She was absent from class.
Her large income enables her to go to Paris every year.
zh: 她丰厚的收入让她每年都能去巴黎。

en: She applied what she had learned in class to the experiment.
zh: 她把课上学到的东西应用到了实验中。

en: She went on talking to her friend even after the class began.
zh: 哪怕开始上课了，她还在跟朋友聊天。

en: She doesn't care for sushi.
She doesn't like sushi.
She does not like sushi.
She has a scarf around her neck.
zh: 她脖子上围着一条围巾。

en: She abstains from drinking.
She gave her oath that she would not drink.
zh: 她发誓说自己再也不喝酒了。

en: She listened to her CDs at random.
After she had read the letter, she tore it to pieces.
zh: 读完那封信后，她把它撕碎了。

en: She finished reading the letter.
She wept reading the letter.
She cried as she read the letter.
She forgot to mail the letter.
She seems to know the art of writing letters.
She is engaged in writing letters.
She sent the letter by airmail.
She tore up the letter.
She finished writing a letter.
She tore the letter into pieces.
She reproached me for not answering the letter.
She added in her letter that she would write again soon.
zh: 她在信里说她很快会再写的。

en: She took a lot of baggage with her.
She took two pieces of baggage with her.
She didn't take much baggage with her.
She greeted him waving her hand.
She smiled, waving her hand.
She designated their table with a wave of the hand.
zh: 她挥手示意了一下他们的桌子。

en: She waved good-bye to me.
She waved goodbye to me.
She reached out for my arm.
She raised her hand.
She raised her hands.
She held out her hand.
She has long arms and legs.
She bit off more than she could chew and was laughed at.
zh: 她自不量力，结果被人笑话了。

en: She had a little round object in her hand.
zh: 她手里拿了个圆圆的小东西。

en: She has flowers in her hand.
She has a flower in her hand.
She has something in her hand.
She always keeps a stick in her hand.
zh: 她手里老是拿着根棍子。

en: She used her hand to screen the sunlight from her eyes.
zh: 她用手遮住眼睛挡太阳。

en: She watched the harvest gathered and the apples picked.
zh: 她看着庄稼收割、苹果被采摘。

en: She gained 500 dollars in the deal.
zh: 她在那笔交易里赚了500美金。

en: She laid her ideas before her chief.
zh: 她向老板汇报了自己的想法。

en: She applied to the chief for a vacation.
She said to her husband: "Stop!".
She spoke in a weak voice.
She looks lonesome.
She looked lonely.
She looks young, but as a matter of fact she is older than you are.
zh: 她看着年轻，其实年纪比你大。

en: She really keeps her youthfulness.
She keeps her youth very well.
She got the job by virtue of her youth and enthusiasm.
zh: 她凭着年轻和热情得到了这份工作。

en: She looks young. But actually, she's over forty.
zh: 她看着挺年轻的，其实都四十多了。

en: She looks young. However, she's actually over forty.
zh: 她看着年轻，不过其实已经四十多了。

en: She looks young, but she's actually over forty.
zh: 她看着年轻，其实已经四十多岁了。

en: She looks young.
She's not young, is she?
She is a very intelligent young lady.
zh: 她是个很聪明的年轻姑娘。

en: She married young.
She is proud of having been beautiful.
zh: 她为自己年轻时漂亮过感到自豪。

en: She must've been beautiful when she was young.
When she was young, she would never eat anything fattening.
zh: 她年轻那会儿，从来不吃容易长胖的东西。

en: She is now better off than when she was young.
zh: 她现在过得比年轻时好多了。

en: She would often take a trip when she was young.
zh: 她年轻的时候经常去旅行。

en: She was a beauty in her day.
When she was young, she preferred coffee to Japanese tea.
zh: 她年轻的时候比起茶更喜欢咖啡。

en: She must have been very beautiful when she was young.
zh: 她年轻的时候肯定很漂亮。

en: She must have been a pretty girl when she was young.
zh: 她年轻的时候肯定是个漂亮的女孩。

en: She is proud of having been beautiful in her youth.
zh: 她为自己年轻时长得漂亮而感到自豪。

en: She was very beautiful when she was young.
zh: 她年轻的时候特别漂亮。

en: She must have been a beauty when she was young.
zh: 她年轻的时候肯定是个大美女。

en: When she was young, she was very beautiful.
zh: 她年轻的时候非常漂亮。

en: When young, she was very popular.
zh: 她年轻的时候特别受欢迎。

en: When she was young, she was very popular.
zh: 她年轻那会儿很受欢迎。

en: It seems that she was a beauty in her day.
zh: 看来她年轻那会儿是个大美女。

en: She may have been beautiful when young.
zh: 她年轻的时候可能很漂亮。

en: She may have been beautiful when she was young.
zh: 她年轻的时候或许很漂亮。

en: She might have been beautiful when she was young.
zh: 她年轻时大概长得很漂亮。

en: She was beautiful in her time.
She was beautiful when she was young.
zh: 她年轻的时候长得很美。

en: She lived in the suburbs of Tokyo when she was young.
zh: 她年轻的时候住在东京郊区。

en: She seems to have been happy when she was young.
zh: 她年轻的时候好像过得挺幸福的。

en: She seems to have been a beauty in her day.
zh: 她年轻时似乎是个大美人。

en: She showed me the poems that she had written in her youth.
zh: 她给我看了她年轻时写的诗。

en: Young as she was, she was equal to the work.
zh: 虽然她还很年轻，但能胜任这份工作。

en: She isn't afraid of snakes.
She drew back when she saw a snake.
zh: 她看到蛇的时候吓得往后退了。

en: Although she wants to buy a vehicle, there is no margin to buy.
zh: 尽管她想买车，但真的没闲钱。

en: She wants to buy a car, but she can't afford to.
She backed her car into the garage.
She may have left her car key in her room.
zh: 她可能把车钥匙忘在房间里了。

en: She is learning how to drive a car.
She doesn't know how to drive a car.
She can't drive a car.
She's lost her car key.
She's lost her car keys.
She was run over by the car.
She was run over by a car.
She was hit by a car.
She was almost knocked down by a car.
She cannot do without her car.
She arrived in a car.
She comes to school in her car.
She got out of the car.
She stayed at home as she didn't have a car.
zh: 因为没车，她就待在家里了。

en: She said that by way of apology.
You ought to have apologized to her.
She is engaged in social work.
She attended the lecture on social welfare.
zh: 她参加了关于社会福利的讲座。

en: She is very photogenic.
She has a picture.
She's fond of taking pictures.
She likes taking pictures.
I wonder where she had her photograph taken.
zh: 我在想她是在哪儿拍的照片。

en: She doesn't actually live in Deal.
She takes a bad picture.
She got kicked upstairs to an executive position.
zh: 她明升暗降，被调去当高管了。

en: What did she actually say?
In fact, she's quite unreliable.
zh: 其实，她这人挺不靠谱的。

en: She does talk a lot.
She is really a good singer.
She's a really nice girl.
She put up her hand to ask a question.
She can ask and answer questions.
zh: 她能提问，也能回答问题。

en: She couldn't answer the question.
As she wanted to ask a question, she raised her hand.
zh: 因为想提问，所以她举了手。

en: She wanted to ask a question, so she raised her hand.
zh: 她想问个问题，就举了手。

en: She burned with jealousy.
She was burning with jealousy.
She is torn by jealousy.
She was green with jealousy.
She scowled at the rude salesman.
zh: 她对着那个没礼貌的店员拉长了脸。

en: She cloaked her disappointment with a smile.
zh: 她用微笑掩饰了自己的失望。

en: She ascribed her failure to bad luck.
zh: 她把失败归结为运气不好。

en: She blamed her failure on bad luck.
zh: 她怪自己运气太差才失败的。

en: She failed and felt humiliated.
She attributed her failure to illness.
She could not sleep at the thought of her failure.
zh: 她一想到失败就愁得睡不着。

en: She is apt to fail.
It seemed as if she was going to faint.
zh: 她看起来像是要晕倒了。

en: There is good reason for her to get scolded.
She has as many as seven children.
She got to the station at seven.
She was set on quitting.
She was fully guaranteed her liberty.
zh: 她的自由得到了充分保障。

en: She has too much chat about her.
She expressed satisfaction with her life.
zh: 她对目前的生活挺满意的。

en: She makes all her own clothes.
zh: 她的衣服全是自己做的。

en: She tends to underestimate her own ability.
zh: 她老是低估自己的能力。

en: She felt herself torn apart.
zh: 她觉得整个人都要崩溃了。

en: She could not state her own opinion.
zh: 她没法表达自己的观点。

en: She accused her husband of having been disloyal to her.
zh: 她指责她老公对她不忠。

en: She expressed her gratitude to all those who had supported her.
zh: 她向所有支持她的人表示了感谢。

en: She tried hard to express herself well.
zh: 她努力想表达清楚自己的意思。

en: She achieved great success in her business.
She cried that she was innocent.
zh: 她哭喊着说她是清白的。

en: She declared that she was not guilty.
She slipped her arm into his.
She was fond of talking about herself.
zh: 她特别喜欢聊自己的事。

en: She liked talking about herself.
Is she sure about her travel plans?
She went out on a limb defending him, and now she has lost her job.
zh: 她冒着风险去护着他，结果现在连工作都丢了。

en: She can make her own dresses.
She takes pride in her looks.
zh: 她对自己的长相挺自信的。

en: She is sensitive about her looks.
zh: 她对自己的长相很敏感。

en: She takes great pride in her appearance.
zh: 她对自己的长相非常自豪。

en: She cares a lot about her personal appearance.
zh: 她非常在乎自己的形象。

en: She had no illusions about her looks.
zh: 她对自己的长相很有自知之明。

en: She saved her baby's life at the risk of losing her own.
zh: 她冒着生命危险救了宝宝。

en: She repeated her name slowly.
zh: 她慢慢地重复了一遍自己的名字。

en: She cannot so much as write her own name.
zh: 她连自己的名字都不会写。

en: She went over the list to see if her name was there.
zh: 她检查了一下名单，看看有没有自己的名字。

en: She skimmed through the register to see if her name was in it.
zh: 她翻了翻登记册，看看有没有自己的名字。

en: She is very proud of her daughter.
zh: 她为自己的女儿感到非常自豪。

en: She is proud of her daughter.
She took offense at her daughter's behavior.
zh: 她对女儿的表现感到很生气。

en: She takes pride in her daughter.
She insisted on her innocence.
zh: 她坚持说自己是清白的。

en: She took her book.
She acknowledged his help in her book.
zh: 她在书里感谢了他的帮助。

en: She told me that his mother was a doctor.
zh: 她告诉我他妈妈是名医生。

en: She persists in saying that her analysis is correct.
zh: 她坚持认为自己的分析是正确的。

en: She used silk thread in sewing her dress.
zh: 她缝裙子的时候用了丝线。

en: She gave away all her dresses.
zh: 她把所有的裙子都送人了。

en: She can make all her own clothes.
zh: 她所有的衣服都能自己做。

en: She decorated her room with bright color.
zh: 她用亮色装饰了自己的房间。

en: She put her room in order.
She decorated her room with roses.
zh: 她用玫瑰花装饰了房间。

en: She looked about in her room.
She looked around her room.
zh: 她环顾了一下自己的房间。

en: No sooner had she entered her room than she began to cry.
She published the book at her own expense.
She was ashamed of herself for her carelessness.
zh: 她为自己的粗心感到羞愧。

en: She sighed over her unhappy fate.
She has faith in her beauty.
zh: 她对自己的美貌很有信心。

en: She boasts about her beauty.
zh: 她老是炫耀自己长得漂亮。

en: She boasts of her beauty.
She is not aware of her beauty.
zh: 她没意识到自己长得漂亮。

en: She is blind to her own beauty.
She seems to devote all her efforts to her career.
zh: 她似乎把所有的精力都放在了事业上。

en: She gave them the benefit of her insight.
zh: 她向他们分享了自己的见解。

en: She is firmly determined to own a store of her own.
zh: 她下定决心要开一家属于自己的店。

en: She is looking forward to her birthday party.
zh: 她正盼着她的生日派对呢。

en: She prides herself on her many accomplishments.
zh: 她为自己取得的众多成就感到自豪。

en: She prides herself on her son.
She takes pride in her son.
She is proud of her sons.
zh: 她为她的儿子们感到自豪。

en: She had a reputation for being well informed about her subjects.
zh: 大家都说她对自己研究的领域很在行。

en: She takes great pride in her stamp collection.
zh: 她对自己的集邮收藏非常自豪。

en: She tried to put energy into her voice.
zh: 她试着让声音听起来更有力。

en: She is proud of her students.
zh: 她为自己的学生们感到骄傲。

en: She brought up her child at the cost of her life.
zh: 她牺牲了自己的生命把孩子抚养长大。

en: She was content with her life.
zh: 她对自己的生活挺满足的。

en: She informed her parents of her success.
zh: 她把成功的消息告诉了父母。

en: She attributed her success to good luck.
zh: 她把成功归功于运气好。

en: She gave away all her dolls.
zh: 她把所有的娃娃都送人了。

en: She seems to devote all her effects to her career.
zh: 她好像把全部家当都投入到了事业中。

en: She sat for her portrait.
zh: 她坐着让人给她画肖像。

en: She felt uneasy at the thought of her future.
zh: 她一想到未来就觉得心里不踏实。

en: She felt insecure about her future.
zh: 她对自己的未来挺没安全感的。

en: She made a fuss about her benefits.
zh: 她为了福利的事儿在那儿大吵大闹。

en: She made her point.
zh: 她把自己的意思说清楚了。

en: She boasts of her car.
She is looking for her car keys.
She felt something go wrong with her car.
zh: 她觉得她的车出啥毛病了。

en: She attributed her failure to her illness.
zh: 她把失败归结于自己生病了。

en: She thought that our watches were the same.
zh: 她以为咱俩的手表是一样的呢。

en: She thinks of herself as an intelligent person.
She saved her children from drowning.
zh: 她把溺水的孩子们救了上来。

en: She had not let go of her son.
She looked her child in the face.
She was very strict with her children.
She abandoned her children.
She left her children behind.
She is proud of her children.
zh: 她为自己的孩子感到骄傲。

en: She lets her children have their own way too much.
She has a thorough grasp of her work.
zh: 她对自己的工作了如指掌。

en: She shows no zeal for her work.
zh: 她对工作一点热情都没有。

en: She put a red ribbon on her umbrella as a mark.
zh: 她在雨伞上系了根红绸子当记号。

en: She is unconscious of her sin.
zh: 她根本没意识到自己有罪。

en: She prides herself on her talent.
zh: 她挺以自己的才华为傲的。

en: She takes pride in her high school.
She was asked to account for her conduct.
zh: 别人要求她对自己的行为作出解释。

en: She took full responsibility for her actions.
zh: 她对自己的行为负全责。

en: She felt no shame at having said what she did.
zh: 她一点儿都不为自己说的话感到羞愧。

en: She explained her idea by means of pictures.
zh: 她用画画来解释自己的想法。

en: She altered her old clothes to make them look more fashionable.
zh: 她把旧衣服改了改，想让它们更时髦点。

en: She knows her limitations.
She had to choose her words carefully.
She didn't mean to offend anyone with her remark.
zh: 她那番话并不是想得罪谁。

en: She was still clinging to the hope that her dog would be found alive.
zh: 她仍抱着一线希望，觉得能找回活着的狗。

en: She tried to lessen her expenses.
She tried to lower her expenses.
She magnified her sufferings.
She is modest about her achievement.
zh: 她对自己的成就挺谦虚的。

en: She unburdened herself of her terrible secret.
zh: 她倾吐了心里那个可怕的秘密。

en: She endeavored to do her duty.
zh: 她尽力履行自己的职责。

en: She was at a loss for words to express her feeling.
zh: 她都不知道该怎么表达自己的心情了。

en: She gave a narrative of her strange experience.
zh: 她讲了讲她那段奇怪的经历。

en: She tried to hide her mistake from us.
zh: 她想瞒着我们不让知道她犯了错。

en: She can't control her emotions.
zh: 她控制不住自己的情绪。

en: She can't suppress her emotions.
zh: 她没法抑制自己的情感。

en: She tried to hide her feelings.
zh: 她试图掩饰自己的感情。

en: She is looking for a job where she can make use of her foreign language ability.
zh: 她想找个能发挥她外语特长的工作。

en: She earns a living by selling her paintings.
She talked on and on about her family problems.
zh: 她没完没了地唠叨家里的那些烦心事。

en: She talked about her family.
She was apprehensive about receiving criticism of her performance.
zh: 她挺担心自己的表现会被人批评。

en: She had her English composition checked by an Englishman.
zh: 她找了个英国人帮她改英文作文。

en: She is afraid of her own shadow.
She had to accept her fate.
She was ready to face her fate.
zh: 她已经准备好面对命运了。

en: She prides herself on her driving skill.
zh: 她对自己的车技挺得意的。

en: She gave up her plans against her will.
She didn't marry him of her own will.
zh: 她嫁给并不是出自她的本意。

en: She put down her thoughts on paper.
She is backward in expressing her opinion.
zh: 她不太敢表达自己的看法。

en: She persisted in her opinion.
She drew the chair towards her.
She put sheets on her bed.
She cheered for her favorite horse.
zh: 她为她看好的那匹马大声喝彩。

en: She filled her bag with apples.
She entered her terrier in a dog show.
zh: 她带着她的梗犬去参加犬展了。

en: She cooked herself a good meal.
zh: 她给自己做了一顿好吃的。

en: She learned her part very quickly.
zh: 她很快就记住了她的台词。

en: She is ashamed of what she's done.
zh: 她对自己做过的事感到很惭愧。

en: She seems to be fond of talking about herself.
zh: 她好像挺爱聊她自己的事。

en: She had forgotten her umbrella so I lent her mine.
zh: 她忘了带伞，我就把我的借给她了。

en: She accused him of stealing her money.
She has been investing her energy in helping the poor in that area.
zh: 她一直全身心地投入到帮助那个地区的穷人中。

en: She loves the color of her T-shirt.
zh: 她很喜欢她那件T恤的颜色。

en: She gave him a handle against her.
She brooded over the bullying done to her.
zh: 她对被欺负的事一直耿耿于怀。

en: She is her own worst enemy.
zh: 她最大的敌人就是她自己。

en: She had never been so proud of herself.
zh: 她从来没这么为自己自豪过。

en: She would rather listen to others than talk herself.
zh: 她宁愿听别人说，也不想自己开口。

en: She wore a sweater that she'd knitted herself.
zh: 她穿了一件自己织的毛衣。

en: She had to alter her dress by herself.
zh: 她不得不自己动手改裙子。

en: She need not go there herself.
She doesn't need to go there herself.
There's no need for her to go there herself.
zh: 没必要让她亲自跑一趟。

en: It's not necessary for her to go there herself.
She had to go herself.
She tried it herself.
She shouted that she was safe.
zh: 她大声喊着说她安全了。

en: She saw there what he had dreamed about.
zh: 她在那里见到了他梦寐以求的东西。

en: She flatters herself by thinking that she is beautiful.
zh: 她自恋地觉得自己长得很漂亮。

en: She is capable of handling the circumstances.
zh: 她能应付得了那种场面。

en: She asserted that she was right.
She persists in saying that she is right.
It aggrieved her much that she could not go.
zh: 不能去让她感到特别难受。

en: She admitted that she was wrong.
She was embarrassed at what she had said.
zh: 她为自己说过的话感到挺尴尬的。

en: She parades her wealth.
She doesn't admit that she is wrong.
She doesn't admit that she is in the wrong.
She said she was a pianist, but that was a lie.
zh: 她说她是钢琴家，但那是骗人的。

en: She reflected on what she had done.
zh: 她反省了一下自己做过的事。

en: She thought of herself as charming enough.
zh: 她觉得她自己够迷人的了。

en: She did the dishes of her own accord.
She volunteered to do the job.
zh: 她自告奋勇去做那份工作。

en: She was killed in an automobile accident.
She lost her son in a car accident.
zh: 她在车祸中失去了儿子。

en: She has large interests in the car industry.
zh: 她在汽车行业有很大一笔投资。

en: She is old enough to hold a driver's license.
She has an automatic washing machine.
zh: 她有一台全自动洗衣机。

en: She can ride a motorcycle, not to mention a bicycle.
zh: 她连摩托车都会骑，更不用说自行车了。

en: Can she ride a bicycle?
She got on her bike and rode away.
She can't ride a bicycle.
She cannot ride a motorcycle, not to mention a bicycle.
zh: 她连摩托车都不会骑，更不用说自行车了。

en: She made an attempt to ride a bicycle.
She hurt her foot when she fell off her bicycle.
zh: 她从自行车上摔下来，把脚弄伤了。

en: She expressed her feelings for nature in a poem.
zh: 她在诗里表达了她对大自然的热爱。

en: She looked around.
I found her in tears in her room.
She was crying in her room.
She attempted to kill herself.
She tried to commit suicide.
She attempted suicide.
She was on the border of killing herself.
She was on the verge of killing herself.
zh: 她当时正处于自杀的边缘。

en: She tried to kill herself.
She adhered strongly to her belief.
She took her own life.
She will have to earn her own living.
She attributed her success to luck.
zh: 她把她的成功归功于运气。

en: She colored up to her temples.
She goes to a school for the deaf.
zh: 她在一家聋哑学校上学。

en: She wears rings on her ears.
She tried again to fix the earring into her ear.
zh: 她又试着把耳环戴回耳朵上。

en: She plays the piano by ear.
She is handicapped by poor hearing.
zh: 听力不好给她带来了很大的不便。

en: She gradually began to understand.
She is getting used to this rural life by degrees.
zh: 她正在一点点适应这种乡村生活。

en: She bought articles of clothing one after another.
zh: 她一件接一件地买衣服。

en: She has waded into one controversy after another.
zh: 她卷入了一个又一个争议。

en: She said she would be twenty years old the following year.
zh: 她说她明年就二十岁了。

en: She received a large advance for her next novel.
zh: 她下一部小说拿到了一大笔预付款。

en: She will visit her mother next Tuesday.
She got off at the next station.
She was at a loss what to say next.
zh: 她不知道接下来该说什么了。

en: She sometimes has her mother cut her hair.
zh: 她有时让她妈妈帮她剪头发。

en: She cursed the times.
She sometimes takes a walk in the park.
She drinks a little wine at times.
She writes to her son every now and then.
zh: 她不时会给她儿子写信。

en: She sometimes writes to her son.
zh: 她有时会给她儿子写信。

en: She writes to her son every so often.
zh: 她隔三差五会给她儿子写信。

en: She writes to her son from time to time.
zh: 她时不时会给她儿子写信。

en: She looked at her watch and noted that it was past five.
zh: 她看了看表，发现已经过五点了。

en: Staring at her watch, she said: "It's already four o'clock."
zh: 她盯着手表说：“已经四点钟了。”

en: She took a casual glance at her watch.
She advanced her watch ten minutes.
zh: 她把手表拨快了十分钟。

en: She advanced the hands on the clock.
She advanced the hand ten minutes.
zh: 她把指针拨快了十分钟。

en: She bowed out of the race before it was too late.
zh: 她在还来得及的时候退出了比赛。

en: She gave all her time to the study.
zh: 她把全部时间都投入到了学习中。

en: She doesn't like people who aren't punctual.
She is economical of her time.
She is never on time.
She seemed pressed for time and often glanced at the clock on the wall.
zh: 她看起来时间很紧，经常瞄一眼墙上的挂钟。

en: She left home bag and baggage.
zh: 她带上全部家当离开了家。

en: She left home with everything she owned.
zh: 她带着她所有的东西离开了家。

en: She is merciful.
She begged for mercy.
She led a group of nuns called the Missionaries of Charity.
zh: 她领导着一个叫“仁爱传教会”的修女团体。

en: She gave clothes to the gypsies out of charity.
zh: 她出于慈善把衣服送给了吉普赛人。

en: She has good handwriting.
She has very neat handwriting.
She writes a very good hand.
She majors in child psychology.
She used the car to go to the office.
She came to know the fact.
zh: 她后来了解到了事实真相。

en: She was merely stating a fact.
zh: 她只是在陈述一个事实。

en: She tried to conceal the fact.
Her argument was founded on fact.
zh: 她的论点是建立在事实基础上的。

en: She doesn't drive for fear of an accident.
zh: 她因为怕出车祸而不敢开车。

en: She broke down when she heard about the accident.
zh: 听到事故的消息时，她崩溃了。

en: She blacked out on seeing the scene of the accident.
zh: 看到事故现场时，她晕了过去。

en: She was unconscious for a whole day after the accident.
zh: 事故发生后，她昏迷了整整一天。

en: She likes to play the koto very much.
She seems to have known the truth of the matter.
zh: 她似乎已经知道了事情的真相。

en: She has a set of irregular teeth.
She practices as a dentist.
She had her tooth pulled.
She couldn't study abroad for lack of money.
zh: 她因为没钱没法出国留学。

en: She passed the examination.
She is busy preparing for the examination.
She is busy preparing for an examination.
She seemed to be satisfied with the result of the exam.
zh: 她看起来对考试结果挺满意的。

en: Did she mention the results of the exam?
She's worrying about her exams.
She was fortunate to pass the exam.
zh: 她很幸运地通过了考试。

en: She studied hard lest she should fail in the exam.
zh: 她刻苦学习，生怕考试不及格。

en: She studied hard lest she should fail her exam.
zh: 她拼命学习，就怕考试不及格。

en: She regrets that she failed the examination.
She failed the test with reason.
zh: 她考试没过是有原因的。

en: She is positive of passing the test.
She made great efforts to pass the examination.
zh: 她为了通过考试付出了很大努力。

en: She exerted herself to pass the examination.
She was happy that she passed the exam.
She passed first in the exam.
She is not a poet but a novelist.
zh: 她不是诗人，而是个小说家。

en: She left out the fourth question on the examination.
zh: 她考试时漏掉了第四题。

en: She is very fond of writing poems.
She really likes writing poems.
She really likes to write poems.
She was absorbed in writing a poem.
She turned her eyes away.
She was fond of poetry and music.
zh: 她以前很喜欢诗歌和音乐。

en: She liked poetry and music.
She ran out of paper.
She sews with a needle and thread.
She makes a point of remembering each one of our birthdays.
zh: 她总是特意记住我们每个人的生日。

en: She attracted our attention.
She lived up to our expectations.
She provided a good dinner for us.
zh: 她请我们吃了一顿丰盛的晚餐。

en: She bears malice toward our group.
zh: 她对我们这组心怀恶意。

en: She revealed her secret to us.
She waved her hand to us.
She taught us singing.
She told us the road was closed.
She asked us to leave her alone.
She is one of the girls we invited to the party.
zh: 她是我们请去参加派对的女孩之一。

en: She showed me around the campus.
She gave me an icy look.
zh: 她冷冰冰地瞪了我一眼。

en: She charged me with being irresponsible.
She asked me to come to her bedside.
She mistook me for my sister.
zh: 她把我错认成我姐姐了。

en: She gave me a strange look.
zh: 她用奇怪的眼神看着我。

en: She beckoned me into the room.
She charged me with dishonesty.
She avoids me.
She called me a fool and what not.
She kept me waiting for a long time.
She knows me.
She helped me morally.
zh: 她在精神上给了我支持。

en: She gave me such a sincere welcome that I was at home with her immediately.
zh: 她欢迎我的样子特别真诚，让我一下子就放松了。

en: She invited me to dinner.
I think she'll help me.
She insisted on helping me.
She broke the vase on purpose to bother me.
zh: 她故意打碎花瓶来气我。

en: She makes me happy.
She came to the station to see me off.
The moment she saw me, she burst into tears.
zh: 她一看到我，就大哭了起来。

en: She waved her hand at the sight of me.
zh: 她一看到我就冲我招了招手。

en: She had no sooner seen me than she ran away.
No sooner had she caught sight of me than she started running in my direction.
zh: 她一看到我，就朝我这个方向跑了过来。

en: She bowed to me with courtesy when she saw me.
zh: 她见到我时很有礼貌地鞠了个躬。

en: She did not so much as look at me.
She smiled at me.
She looked at me and smiled.
She did not so much as smile at me.
zh: 她连冲我笑一下都没有。

en: She burst out laughing when she saw me.
zh: 她一看到我就哈哈大笑起来。

en: The moment she saw me, she began laughing.
zh: 她一看到我就笑了起来。

en: She looked at me.
She has scorn for me.
She took me for my brother.
She mistook me for my brother.
She made me hurry.
She invited me to her home.
She supposed me to be a doctor.
She thought that I was a doctor.
She looks down on me for not having a sense of humor.
zh: 她因为我没幽默感而瞧不起我。

en: She invited me to the ballet.
She treats me as if I were a baby.
zh: 她把我当小孩儿一样对待。

en: She gave a glance at me.
She did not so much as cast glance at me.
She took me for Mr Tamori.
zh: 她把我当成了田森先生。

en: She mistook me for Mr. Tamori.
zh: 她把我看成了田森先生。

en: She beguiled me of my money.
She made me a star.
She stared at me.
She scolds Terry as often as me.
zh: 她骂特里的次数和我一样多。

en: She scolds Terry about as often as she scolds me.
zh: 她骂特里的频率跟我差不多。

en: She introduced me to her brother.
zh: 她把我介绍给了她哥哥。

en: She accused me of being a liar.
She kept me waiting for 30 minutes.
She kept me waiting for half an hour.
She made me wait for half an hour.
She left me standing there for two hours.
zh: 她让我等在那儿，一站就是两个小时。

en: She has an advantage over me.
She is senior to me by three years.
She's three years older than me.
She's three years older than I am.
She can swim further than I can.
She played the heroine better than I.
She is three years older than I am.
She loves Tom more than she does me.
She loves Tom more than she loves me.
She is much taller than I.
She's way taller than me.
She is senior to me by six years.
She's six years older than me.
She's six years older than I am.
She is five years junior to me.
She's five years younger than me.
She's five years younger than I am.
She is senior to me by two years.
She's two years older than me.
She's two years older than I am.
She caught me by the arm and stopped me from going home.
zh: 她抓住了我的胳膊，不让我回家。

en: She caught me by the arm.
She gripped my arm tightly.
zh: 她紧紧地抓住了我的胳膊。

en: She pinched my arm sharply.
zh: 她狠狠地掐了一下我的胳膊。

en: I met nice people.
zh: 我遇到了一些很好的人。

en: She threw herself into my arms.
She held my arm firmly.
zh: 她紧紧地抓着我的胳膊。

en: She doesn't like the way I speak.
zh: 她不喜欢我说话的方式。

en: She is my girlfriend.
I'm afraid she will turn down my request.
zh: 我担心她会拒绝我的请求。

en: She is a friend of mine.
She is one of my friends.
She didn't feel comfortable with my friend.
zh: 她跟我那个朋友在一起觉得不太自在。

en: She looked me in the eye.
She means more than my life to me.
zh: 她对我来说比命还重要。

en: She appeared to have forgotten my name.
She took advantage of my ignorance.
She played a trick on my sister.
She gave me whatever help I needed.
zh: 她给了我所有需要的帮助。

en: She asked after my mother.
She is not my mother but my oldest sister.
She is not my mother but rather my oldest sister.
zh: 她不是我妈，而是我大姐。

en: She promised me to clean my room.
She promised me that she would clean my room.
zh: 她答应过我她会打扫房间的。

en: She gave my elbow a little jog.
zh: 她轻轻碰了碰我的胳膊肘。

en: She is aware of my secret plan.
She has no illusion about my ability.
zh: 她对我的能力不抱幻想。

en: I thought she was my special friend.
zh: 我还以为她是我特别的朋友。

en: She continued to see him in disregard of my advice.
zh: 她不顾我的建议，继续和他见面。

en: She did not take kindly to my advice.
She is deaf to my advice.
zh: 她对我的建议充耳不闻。

en: She seldom pays regard to my advice.
She gave me something very nice for my birthday.
zh: 她送了我一件很棒的生日礼物。

en: She will attend the meeting instead of me.
She reproached me for being lazy.
She apologized to me for stepping on my foot.
zh: 她因为踩了我的脚向我道歉。

en: She came up to me and asked my name.
She was not in the least pleased with my present.
zh: 她对我的礼物一点都不满意。

en: She was much delighted at my gift.
zh: 收到我的礼物，她非常开心。

en: She was very happy with my gift.
She will get along with my grandmother.
zh: 她会和我奶奶相处得很好。

en: I found a true friend in her.
zh: 我在她身上找到了真正的友谊。

en: She became a true friend of mine.
She made believe that she had not heard me.
She congratulated me on my success.
She is envious of my success.
She is a good friend of mine.
She turned down my offer.
She gave a flat refusal to my offer.
zh: 她一口回绝了我的提议。

en: She rejected my proposal.
She allowed that my offer was reasonable.
zh: 她承认我的提议确实有道理。

en: She turned down my proposal.
She took my joke seriously.
She refused my invitation.
She declined my invitation.
She is seeking my advice.
She may have been surprised when she received my letter.
zh: 她收到我的信时，大概挺惊讶的。

en: She was displeased at my letter.
zh: 她看了我的信挺不高兴的。

en: She gave no answer to my letter.
She answered my letter soon.
She answered my letter right away.
She took hold of my hand and held it tightly.
zh: 她拉住我的手，攥得紧紧的。

en: She took my hand.
She clasped my hands and said she was glad to see me.
zh: 她握住我的双手，说见到我很高兴。

en: She held on to my hand tightly.
She avoided answering my questions.
She nodded in response to my question.
zh: 面对我的提问，她点了点头。

en: She works by far the hardest of anyone in my office.
zh: 她绝对是我们办公室里最拼的一个。

en: She takes care of my children.
She cared for my children very kindly.
zh: 她对我孩子照顾得很周到。

en: As soon as she saw me, she began to weep.
zh: 她一见到我就开始掉眼泪。

en: As soon as she saw me, she burst out crying.
zh: 她一见到我就大哭起来。

en: As soon as she saw me, she started to cry.
zh: 她一见到我就哭了起来。

en: She's about the same age as my older sister.
She's about the same age as my sister.
She is my elder sister.
She's my older sister.
She's my sister.
She is not my sister but my mother.
She agreed to my idea.
She agreed with my idea.
She is a friend of my wife's.
She is envious of my good fortune.
She cooks things for me that I like.
zh: 她给我做的菜都是我爱吃的。

en: She cooks chicken the way I like.
zh: 她做的鸡肉正合我胃口。

en: She gave me a necktie which was completely to my liking.
zh: 她送了我一条我非常喜欢的领带。

en: She appeals to me.
She isn't to my taste.
She pointed out my mistake.
She insisted that it was my fault.
She seems to have taken my remark as an insult.
zh: 她好像把我的话当成了侮辱。

en: She acknowledged that my statement was true.
She took my words as a joke.
zh: 她把我的话当成了玩笑。

en: She took offence at my word.
I'm afraid she won't accept my explanation.
zh: 我怕她不接受我的解释。

en: She patted me on the shoulder.
She took care of my dog.
She ignored all my warnings.
zh: 她完全没把我的警告当回事。

en: She approved of my plan.
She has a strong objection to my plan.
She took my brother for me.
She mistook my brother for me.
zh: 她把我兄弟认错成我了。

en: She seems to be in love with my brother.
She gave my shoes a quick brush.
She complained to me of my small salary.
zh: 她跟我抱怨我的工资太低。

en: She complained about my low salary.
zh: 她抱怨我的工资太低了。

en: She complained that my salary was low.
She had begun to recede in my memory.
zh: 我对她的印象开始模糊了。

en: My memory of her has begun to recede.
zh: 我对她的记忆开始淡忘了。

en: She gives me a nasty look every time she sees me.
zh: 她每次见到我都没好脸色。

en: She began to cry at the sight of my face.
She couldn't look me straight in the face.
She accused me of making a mistake.
She slapped me on the chin.
She asked about my school.
She gets up the earliest in my family.
She lived next door to us.
She did not come even as far as my house.
zh: 她甚至连我家这儿都没走到。

en: I'd rather she sat next to me.
She didn't quite understand my English.
zh: 她不太听得懂我的英语。

en: She is the woman of my desires.
She turned down my request.
She is the only friend I have.
She always finds fault with the way I do things.
zh: 她老是挑我做事的毛病。

en: She gave me a peck on the cheek.
zh: 她在我的脸上亲了一小口。

en: She kissed me on the cheek and said goodnight.
zh: 她亲了亲我的脸，跟我说了声晚安。

en: She gave a pluck at my elbow.
She wears the same watch as mine.
zh: 她戴的手表跟我的一模一样。

en: She sat next to me.
She did all she could on my account.
zh: 她为了我的事已经尽力了。

en: She worked on my account.
zh: 她是因为我的缘故才工作的。

en: She's my type.
She pulled my shirt.
She applied a bandage to my hurt finger.
zh: 她帮我受伤的手指包扎了一下。

en: She is my classmate.
She was tempted to come with me.
zh: 她动了跟我一起去的念头。

en: She was told to accompany me.
She rooms at my aunt's.
She is only critical of me.
She has twice as many CDs as I do.
She knows ten times as many English words as I do.
zh: 她认识的英语单词是我的十倍。

en: She is cold to me.
She gave me a piece of good advice.
zh: 她给了我一个很好的建议。

en: She promised me to come.
She promised me that she'd come.
She wanted me to come.
She told me such stories as were useful.
zh: 她给我讲了些挺有用的故事。

en: She told me an interesting story.
zh: 她给我讲了个很有趣的故事。

en: She is like a mother to me.
zh: 她对我来说就像妈妈一样。

en: She asked me about my mother.
She did not keep her promise to write to me.
zh: 她没按说好的给我写信。

en: She said good-bye to me and went through the ticket gate.
zh: 她跟我说了再见，然后进了检票口。

en: She bade farewell to me.
She gave me a stiff smile.
She told me her secret.
zh: 她把她的秘密告诉我了。

en: She asked me if I knew his address.
zh: 她问我知不知道他的地址。

en: She showed me his album.
She turned her back to me.
It is kind of her to show me the way.
She asked me for an unreasonable sum of money.
zh: 她管我要了一笔多得离谱的钱。

en: She was always telephoning me.
She wrote me a long letter.
She bowed to me politely.
zh: 她礼貌地向我鞠了个躬。

en: She made a polite bow to me.
She left me a note.
She walked away without acknowledging me.
zh: 她没跟我打招呼就走开了。

en: She gave me a watch for a birthday present.
zh: 她送了我一块手表当生日礼物。

en: She asked me who had arrived first.
zh: 她问我谁是第一个到的。

en: She asked me whether I was all right.
She asked me if I was all right.
She took back the coat she lent me.
zh: 她把我借她的外套要回去了。

en: Her behaviour toward me was a departure from the norm.
zh: 她对我表现得有点反常。

en: She is hostile to me.
She is very bitter toward me.
She told me to open the window.
She bestowed a gift on me.
She asked me to open the window.
She told me, "open the window".
She said that I should come home soon.
She told me that it would be a good idea if I came home soon.
zh: 她跟我说早点回家比较好。

en: She made me a nice dress.
zh: 她给我做了一件漂亮的裙子。

en: She gave me a wonderful present.
zh: 她送了我一份超棒的礼物。

en: She gave me a nice pair of shoes.
zh: 她送了我一双挺好的鞋。

en: She advises me on technical matters.
zh: 她在技术问题上给我提建议。

en: She gave me a doll.
She was kind to me.
She insisted on my paying the bill for the dinner.
She provided me with some food.
She spoke to me in a whisper.
zh: 她小声跟我说了几句话。

en: She got me a tiny toy.
She appealed to me for help.
She asked me for help.
She informed me of her departure.
She asked me to help her with her assignment.
She sent me a letter.
She waved her hand to me.
She gave me some practical advice.
zh: 她给了我一些实用的建议。

en: She asked me a question.
She gave me permission to use her dictionary.
She informed me of her decision.
zh: 她把她的决定告诉我了。

en: She showed her album to me.
She inspired me with confidence.
A watch was given to me by her.
She gave me a watch.
She taught me how to write a poem.
She asked me to help her with the work.
She sent me an urgent telegram.
She treated me to a cup of tea.
She gave me a shy smile.
She answered me back.
She doesn't speak to me.
She came near to me.
She remarked that I should quit smoking.
zh: 她随口说了句我该戒烟了。

en: She said that I should quit smoking.
She cooked some fish for me.
She asked me whether I was perhaps not feeling very well.
zh: 她问我是不是哪儿不舒服。

en: She passed by without seeing me.
zh: 她路过的时候没看见我。

en: She suggested to me that I call off the meeting.
She refused to notice me.
She has forgotten seeing me before.
She came here to see me.
She came all the way from New York to see me.
zh: 她大老远从纽约跑来看我。

en: She came to see me.
She telephoned to invite me to her house.
She told me where to go.
She asked me how many languages I spoke.
She asked me to pass her the salt.
She asked me to meet her at the station.
She showed me a letter written in English.
zh: 她给我看了一封英文信。

en: She taught me how to swim.
She told me how to swim.
She insisted that I should see the doctor.
She admonished me that I should consult a doctor.
She showered abuse on me.
She picked me an apple.
She found me a good seat.
She was very short with me.
She seems to have a surprise in store for me.
zh: 她好像给我准备了什么惊喜。

en: She plainly interpreted Picasso's paintings to me.
zh: 她通俗易懂地给我讲了讲毕加索的画。

en: She accompanied me on the piano.
She is a kind of mother to me.
zh: 她对我来说就像妈妈一样。

en: She appears to me to be cruel.
She asked me if I knew Tom's address.
zh: 她问我知不知道汤姆的地址。

en: She used to address me as Tom.
She showed me which dress to wear.
zh: 她告诉过我该穿哪条裙子。

en: She told me which clothes would be good to wear.
zh: 她跟我说穿哪身衣服比较好。

en: She is very annoyed with me.
She is very angry with me.
She is most kind to me.
She is very dear to me.
She asked me where to go.
She asked me where I was going.
Not a word did she say to me.
She didn't say even one word to me.
zh: 她连一句话都没跟我说。

en: She took my umbrella without so much as asking me.
zh: 她问都不问就把我的伞拿走了。

en: She called me a taxi.
She gave me plenty to eat.
She said good-by to me for good.
She cheated me into accepting the story.
She got me to believe that story.
zh: 她让我相信了那个故事。

en: She introduced the lady to me.
zh: 她把那位女士介绍给了我。

en: She fitted me out with the money.
zh: 她拿那笔钱帮我置办齐了东西。

en: She explained the matter to me.
She wouldn't allow me to read the letter.
She didn't pay me the money.
She was so kind as to inform me of it.
zh: 她人真好，还特意把这事告诉了我。

en: She gave me a charming smile.
She found a nice tie for me.
zh: 她帮我找了条挺好看的领带。

en: She wrote to me to come at once.
She bade me good-by.
She said goodbye to me.
She gave me these old coins.
She served me coffee.
She made me a cake.
She explained to me how to make a cake.
She gave me a pretty doll.
zh: 她送了我一个漂亮的洋娃娃。

en: She made tea for me.
She poured tea for me.
She poured me some tea.
She brought a cup of tea to me.
She brought me a cup of tea.
She poured me a cup of tea.
She poured a cup of tea for me.
She went out without even asking me to have a seat.
zh: 她连坐都没让我坐就出去了。

en: She wished me good night.
She told me not to tell lies.
She cannot have told a lie to me.
She may have told me a lie.
She wants me to go with her.
She bought an album for me.
She showed me her album.
She told me that she would go to Paris in August.
zh: 她跟我说她八月要去巴黎。

en: She handed me a sheet of paper.
She told me not to go there alone.
zh: 她让我别一个人去那儿。

en: She greeted me with "Good morning."
zh: 她跟我打招呼说了声“早上好”。

en: She said to me "Let's go shopping."
zh: 她对我说“咱们去逛街吧”。

en: She did not so much as say "Good morning" to me.
zh: 她连句“早上好”都没跟我说。

en: They insisted on my getting the work done by tomorrow.
zh: 他们坚持要我明天之前把活儿干完。

en: She asked me who I thought would win the tournament.
zh: 她问我，我觉得谁能赢那场比赛。

en: She told me that I could use her room.
zh: 她跟我说我可以用她的房间。

en: She asked me to write a letter to a friend of hers in Germany.
zh: 她让我给她一个德国朋友写封信。

en: She whispered to me that she was hungry.
She asked me to wake her at six.
She came across to speak to me.
She didn't appear to recognize me.
She is as tall as I.
She is about as tall as me.
She has as many stamps as I.
zh: 她的邮票跟我的一样多。

en: She and I have about the same number of stamps.
zh: 我和她的邮票差不多一样多。

en: She has about as many stamps as I do.
zh: 她的邮票跟我差不多一样多。

en: She is as young as I am.
She speaks English as well as I.
zh: 她的英语说得跟我一样好。

en: She speaks English as well as I do.
zh: 她的英语跟我说得一样好。

en: She refused to go with me.
She is about my age.
She's about the same age as me.
She's about the same age as I am.
She has a view that is different from mine.
zh: 她的看法跟我不太一样。

en: She lost her temper along with me.
She didn't exactly agree with me.
zh: 她并不完全同意我的看法。

en: Never did I expect to see her in such a place.
zh: 我压根没想到会在这种地方碰到她。

en: I never expected to meet her in a place like this.
zh: 我真没想到会在这样的地方遇见她。

en: She shared her piece of cake with me.
She treated each of us to an ice cream.
zh: 她请我们每人吃了一个冰淇淋。

en: She took us all in with her smile.
zh: 她的笑容把我们所有人都迷住了。

en: She asked us to dinner.
She threw a glance at us.
She danced with a grace that surprised us all.
zh: 她优美的舞姿让我们大家都很惊讶。

en: She made a beautiful dinner for all of us.
zh: 她为我们大家做了一顿丰盛的晚餐。

en: She lives next door to us.
She steered our efforts in the right direction.
zh: 她引导我们往正确的方向努力。

en: She turned down our proposal.
She is playing an important role in our organization.
zh: 她在我们组织里起着很重要的作用。

en: She will take care of everything for us.
zh: 她会帮我们把一切都打理好。

en: She turned up her nose at our offer.
zh: 她对我们的提议嗤之以鼻。

en: She accepted our invitation.
She didn't take part in our conversation.
She threatened to set our house on fire.
zh: 她威胁说要放火烧了我们的房子。

en: She asked us if we would like to cook.
She gave us some useful information.
zh: 她给了我们一些有用的信息。

en: She cooked vegetable soup for us.
She entertained us with an interesting episode.
zh: 她讲了个有趣的故事逗我们开心。

en: She sang a Japanese song for us.
zh: 她为我们唱了一首日语歌。
